You are tearin’ me apart
 When you treat me so unkind
The narrator is perplexed by his lover’s actions. He is questioning her reasoning for being so hurtful to him. If he could only understand why.
Did you mean to break my heart and watch me die?

There are some women who enjoy the power that they gain by making men fall in love with them. This has been addressed in other hit songs, such as “I Know What Boys Like”, by The Waitresses, and “Oops, I Did It Again”, by Britney Spears.

What goes on in your heart?
 What goes on in your mind?

This is the ultimate question for a man. To most men, the heart and mind of a woman are a complete mystery. Even Stephan Hawking, one of the greatest minds of our time, has admitted that he can’t figure out women.
Immediately after this line is sung, John Lennon can be heard saying something like “I already told you why!”, in a sly reference to the previously released Beatles song, “Tell Me Why.”
